story.title: List Quest: The Treasure Hunt
story.narrative: In the vibrant world of DataLand, young explorers embark on a quest to uncover treasures hidden in the vast data forests. Guided by the Wise Sage of Lists, they must navigate through enchanted forests, organizing magical items into sequences that unlock the path to fortune.
story.background: Set in the mystical realm of DataLand, a world where every forest and river is made up of data structures. The enchanted forest holds treasures that can only be accessed by correctly organizing the magical items using list structures.
story.learning_goal: Enhance understanding of list data structures by organizing data visually and interactively, demonstrating the ability to manipulate and traverse lists.
story.challenge_description: Students must sort enchanted objects into a correct list order to unlock powerful spells. They will face random sequences of magical items and must identify patterns to properly organize them, using drag-and-drop to complete the task.

html_structure.layout: A responsive grid layout with sections for instructions, the main game area, and feedback. Flexbox is used for item arrangement.
html_structure.responsive_design: The game adapts using media queries to adjust grid layout for mobile, tablet, and desktop, ensuring optimal interaction on all devices.

visual_effects: Linear gradients for backgrounds, box-shadow for depth, smooth transitions for hover and active states

javascript_functionality.game_state: Managed using an object with properties for current sequence, student progress, and score.

interactions.validation: Checks if the sequence order is correct
Validates entire sequence before providing feedback

javascript_functionality.randomization: Uses a randomizer function to shuffle the magical items presented to each student.
javascript_functionality.feedback_system: Provides visual feedback with color changes and animations for correct/incorrect sequences.
javascript_functionality.scoring: Based on speed and accuracy of placing items correctly, with a score display in the feedback panel.

anti_cheating_measures: Dynamic item sequences that change every session
Animations that cannot be captured in screenshots

steps.description: Students are presented with a randomized sequence of magical items
steps.user_action: Drag and arrange items into the correct order
steps.visual_feedback: Items animate into place, glowing green when correct

steps.description: Submit the arranged sequence for validation
steps.visual_feedback: Sequence briefly highlights in green or red for correct/incorrect

gameplay_flow.challenge_question: What pattern do you observe in the organization of magical items?

answer_validation.correct_criteria: All items in the correct sequential order
answer_validation.partial_credit: Awarded for sections of consecutively correct items
